short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DocSight AI quickly summarizes Teams meetings, capturing key points, decisions, and actions, saving time and boosting productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of your meetings with ease! The DocSight AI Chrome extension allows you to automatically summarize your Microsoft Teams meetings and receive the summaries directly in your email.

How It Works:

Simply click on the DocSight AI extension from your Chrome browser.
If you're logged into your DocSight AI account, you'll be redirected to the meeting template page to quickly set up your meeting summaries.
Not logged in? No worries! You'll be directed to our login page for a quick sign-in.
Once set, DocSight AI will automatically generate meeting summaries and send them to your email, helping you stay organized and never miss any key details.
Key Features:

Seamless integration with Microsoft Teams.
Instant access to meeting summaries via email.
Easy setup through our intuitive web app.
Saves time by providing clear and concise meeting recaps.
Boost your productivity and ensure you never miss a beat with DocSight AI!
